original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical systems, blending deep business acumen with strong technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate efficiently. You will focus on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging cutting-edge machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive process improvements and enhance system capabilities.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, understand complex processes, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting any issues that arise
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools such as database querying and data visualization to uncover insights
- Proactively identify ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) processes
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and enhancement
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate smooth implementation and provide ongoing support for system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex issues and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to leverage various tools and techniques to uncover insights and identify areas for improvement

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming, allowing you to delve deeper into system configurations and integrations
- Expertise in SQL, enabling you to efficiently query and manipulate data to support your analytical efforts

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of implementing and optimizing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, with a strong understanding of how these technologies can be leveraged to drive process improvements
- Experience in a similar role, where you have demonstrated the ability to bridge the gap between business requirements and technical implementations

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, which can enhance your ability to collaborate effectively and deliver iterative solutions
- Prior experience working in the vehicle configuration space, providing you with a deeper understanding of the unique challenges and opportunities within this domain

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for backend configuration and integration
- SQL and data analysis tools for querying and visualizing data
- ML and AI platforms and frameworks for developing innovative solutions

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment, requiring strong communication and coordination skills
- Agile development methodology, with a focus on iterative delivery and continuous improvement
- Expectation to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and to proactively identify opportunities for innovation
